content: this crochet **heart square** pattern is my small way of protesting against an absurd war that never in a million years i would have expected to witness here in europe all my love goes to the people in ukraine and hopefully not just love how about supporting the cause with a little donation **let s support ukraine** here s the deal i ll put the pattern free on ravelry but when you add the pattern to your library you automatically pledge to make a small donation in support of ukraine there are plenty of campaigns starting all around the world to support ukraine and ukraine refugees so feel free to choose your favorite here are a couple of useful links in case you need help finding a campaign > on this website here > helpukraine center 1 you can find > what s needed and what not to help > people in ukraine it is in ukrainian > but google will translate it for you > > the cnn has started a campaign to > raise money you can find it > here 2 > > here 3 you ll find a few more > resources > > lovecrafts has started a campaign to > support their ukraine-based team > members you can contribute here 4 1 https //www helpukraine center/ 2 https //action publicgood com/campaign/13ac7e1b-4de6-4f7c-b128-4346f73b9832 title=how%20to%20provide%20aid%20to%20those%20in%20ukraine&utm_content=http%3a%2f%2fcms3-mobile-preview api cnn io&utm_medium=button&utm_source=cnn 3 https //www supportukraine co/humanitarial-help 4 https //www justgiving com/crowdfunding/supportukrainiancolleagues
